verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: At his summit with Kim Jong - un in Singapore] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: that the U.S. will suspend its military exercises with South Korea , as denuclearization talks proceed] .
At his summit with Kim Jong - un in Singapore , President Trump announced that the U.S. [V: will] suspend its military exercises with South Korea , as denuclearization talks proceed .

At his summit with Kim Jong - un in Singapore , President Trump announced that [ARG0: the U.S.] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: suspend] [ARG1: its military exercises with South Korea] , [ARGM-TMP: as denuclearization talks proceed] .
At his summit with Kim Jong - un in Singapore , President Trump announced that the U.S. will suspend its military exercises with South Korea , as [ARG1: denuclearization talks] [V: proceed] .
